Oh, sorry, I thought that the DED base was the one in North America, I guess
he followed the wrong group, since I stated that he followed Havotron and
company I'll have to play it.


Megaton transformed to his freakish robot mode shrinking down to a size more
suitable for negotiations.. his T-rex legs folded around and landed with a
thud. His face grinned a grin very much resembling the megalomaniacle tyrant
his DNA was patterned from. (Megatron.)  "My name is Megaton and I dare to
tell you to stop." his grin faded to a sneer letting his attitude show.

"My intentions are not to join you but to bring all factions of this planet
together whether it be in chains or in peace is entirely up to all." the
leadership qualities of a Predacon/ Decepticon leader were to be willing to
challenge anyone in the way of leadership. The ritual was also a sign of
respect and admiration. If a leader was to find an opponent worth
challenging it was usually as an equal. "And in this case Megatron must be
replaced by a higher grade of bot such as myself." He knew he'd need the
entire package  , Necromancers strength and Megatrons cunning, if his
powerplay was to succeed.
----- Original Message -----
From: <gunthers@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Friday, August 03, 2001 11:50 AM
Subject: Re: After the pain.


> OOC at bottom towards cyberwolf
>
> Havotron heard the loud dragon.  Suddenly coming to a halt he
> yelled "WHO DARES TELL THE GREAT HAVOTRON TO STOP."
>
> After the dragon landed he listened contently.  "You, may, join the
> ranks of the D.E.D.  Decepticons for Earth's Domination....or
> Demise...  I am Lord Havotron, leader of the D.E.D, and future ruler
> of the universe. "
>
> Needlenose looked at the dragon eerily.
>
> Meanwhile back with the Contstructicons.  Scrapper looked to the
> speck in the distance that was Havotron.  "Constructicons, listen
> to me....Havotron has not been fair to us, mad because one of our
> ranks could not complete the joining into the gestalt.  Would
> Megatron, no I don't beleive so.  I have devised a plan, to bring the
> real leader of the Decepticons back to power, we, the
> Constructicons will re-join with Megatron."
>
> OOC:  Cyberwolf, the D.E.D are another faction of Decepticons,
> with the leader Havotron.  Thier base is inside of Mt Fuji, not with
> the other Decepticons which base is now moving slowly through
> Hudsons bay.
>
